header.title: Quote Post Back Link (QPBL)
header.description: When a post is quoted on your forum this MOD will automatically add a link back to the original post in the quote.

changelog.change: [Fix] #3, quotes without user and post trimmed first character.
[Change] Allow the admin to define whether topic titles are forced to lower case or not.
[Fix] First character of quotes get cut off.
[Fix] Don't break the quotes when there are multiple "postID'ed" quoted.
[Add] Insert the post ID when clicking on the "quote button".
[Add] Insert the post ID when clicking on the "quote button" in topic review.
